tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClimateChangePolicies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_type VARCHAR(100),
    implementation_date DATE,
    carbon_target DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_change_policies_table (
   country VARCHAR,
   policy_name VARCHAR,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   policy_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE climate_regulations_table (
   country VARCHAR,
   regulation_name VARCHAR,
   regulator VARCHAR,
   regulation_type VARCHAR,
   effective_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangePolicies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    implementation_date DATE,
    policy_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangeRegulations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    effective_date DATE,
    regulation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangeReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangePolicies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    policy_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangePolicies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    region VARCHAR(100),
    implementation_date DATE,
    policy_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyCategories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES ClimateChangePolicies(policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryBodies (
    body_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    body_name VARCHAR(255),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES ClimateChangePolicies(policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    update_date DATE,
    update_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES ClimateChangePolicies(policy_id)
)
